checks.label: Duplicate payment verification
checks.detail: 231 high-confidence groups (£1.6M). Duplicate ratio: 1.5%. Filtered out: 25 batch payments, 674 CSV overlaps.

checks.label: Split payment analysis
checks.detail: 5 suspect instances (£1.6M, 1.8% of spend). Threshold: 5+ payments to same supplier in same week, 80%+ of approval limit.

checks.label: Year-end spike verification
checks.detail: Highest spike: 2.1x in lfrs. Year-end spikes are common in public sector (capital programmes, grants). Only extreme spikes (>3x) warrant concern.

checks.label: CH compliance verification
checks.detail: No confirmed payments during active breach periods after filtering enrichment errors and undated violations.

checks.label: Benford's Law forensic screening
checks.detail: Significant deviation from Benford's Law (p < 0.001). χ²=795.75 on 13653 amounts >£100. Largest deviation: digit 3 (5.0% off expected).

warnings: Benford's Law analysis shows significant deviation (χ²=795.75). Digit 3 deviates 5.0% from expected. This warrants investigation but can also occur with legitimate round-number grants or threshold-based payments.
